home.heroDescription: Submit insurance claims without revealing your sensitive medical information. Our ZK technology ensures your privacy while maintaining full transparency for insurers.
home.howItWorksSubtitle: Submit insurance claims in just 4 simple steps while keeping your data private.
home.whyChooseSubtitle: Our zero-knowledge proof technology ensures your medical data stays private while enabling transparent and verifiable insurance claims.
home.readyToStartSubtitle: Join thousands of users who trust ZK Medical Insurance for their privacy-preserving healthcare coverage.

privacy.title: Privacy Protected
privacy.description: Your medical records stay private with zero-knowledge proofs

transparent.title: Transparent Claims
transparent.description: All claims are verifiable on-chain without exposing data

fast.title: Fast Processing
fast.description: Automated verification speeds up claim processing

secure.title: Blockchain Secured
secure.description: Immutable records ensure trust and accountability

createProduct.title: Create New Product
createProduct.subtitle: Create a new insurance product for users to purchase
createProduct.fillDetailsDesc: Fill in the details for your new insurance product
createProduct.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this insurance product covers...
createProduct.premiumHint: Amount users pay for the policy
createProduct.initialFundingHint: Optional: Add initial funds to the pool
createProduct.reviewDesc: Please review the product details before creating
createProduct.productCreatedDesc: Your insurance product has been created successfully. Users can now purchase policies.
createProduct.helpPremium: The amount users pay to purchase a policy. Set competitively based on coverage.
createProduct.helpCoverage: Maximum amount a user can claim during the policy period.
createProduct.helpPool: Initial liquidity to pay claims. You can add more funds later.
createProduct.warningMessage: ⚠️ Once created, product terms cannot be modified. Ensure all details are correct.
createProduct.connectToCreate: Connect your wallet to create products.

adminSystem.contractStatusDesc: Current state of the insurance manager contract.
adminSystem.pausedWarning: All contract operations are currently paused. Users cannot purchase policies or submit claims.
adminSystem.pauseDesc: Pause all contract operations in case of emergency
adminSystem.updateVerifierDesc: Update the zero-knowledge proof verifier contract
adminSystem.pauseConfirmDesc: This will pause all contract operations. Users will not be able to purchase policies or submit claims until resumed.
adminSystem.resumeConfirmDesc: This will resume all contract operations. Users will be able to purchase policies and submit claims again.
adminSystem.contractPausedDesc: All contract operations have been paused.
adminSystem.verifierUpdatedDesc: ZK verifier contract has been updated to
adminSystem.updateVerifierModalDesc: Enter the address of the new ZK proof verifier contract.
adminSystem.adminPermissionsDesc: As an admin, you have full control over the contract. Use these powers responsibly. All actions are recorded on the blockchain and are irreversible.
